meanings.definition: A person who knows or has knowledge
meanings.sent1: The knower of the secret revealed the truth.
meanings.sent2: She is a knower of many languages.
meanings.sent3: The knower of all things mysterious is my cat!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like those of a knower of ancient secrets.
meanings.sent5: The knower of the stars guided us through the night.

meanings.definition: One who has personal knowledge of something
meanings.sent1: The knower of the shortcut led the way.
meanings.sent2: He is a knower of the best fishing spots.
meanings.sent3: The knower of the missing socks strikes again!
meanings.sent4: She was a knower of the forest's hidden paths.
meanings.sent5: The knower of the recipe shared her secrets with us.
